articles.author: John Timmer
articles.title: US acceptance of COVID vaccines rises, now like other Western democracies - Ars Technica
articles.description: Despite the controversy, the US's vaccine acceptance looks very European.
articles.content:

COVID vaccines remain the safest way to reduce the chance that SARS-CoV-2 can put you in the hospital and are a critical component of the public health campaign again… [+4614 chars]
